abstract: Prime Minister Gordon Brown called on China and oil-rich Gulf states to help the International Monetary Fund deal with the fallout of the credit crisis.
snippet: Prime Minister Gordon Brown called on China and oil-rich Gulf states to help the International Monetary Fund deal with the fallout of the credit crisis.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  Prime Minister Gordon Brown of Britain called Tuesday for China and the Persian Gulf states to put up more money to help the International Monetary Fund deal with the fallout of the credit crisis.

headline.main: British Leader Calls for Larger I.M.F. Bailout Fund
headline.print_headline: Britain Calls On Others To Contribute to I.M.F.
